short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Video Database for your Catch' em All! Integrating with compatible webpages. From the Youtube Channel Mr. Pokédex!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Video Database for your Catch' em All! Seamlessly integrating with compatible webpages, it provides easy access to a vast collection of video guides from the YouTube channel Mr. Pokedex.
